text: When my oldest kids came home from college to shelter in place, I laid down the law -- no dorm life here. Ten days later, I'm finishing a Netflix binge at 2:30 a.m. and logging onto World of Warcraft. Me, in Time, on parenting college kids in quarantine: https://t.co/04xKkfmQas

entity.name: World of Warcraft
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable.
